title: Data Science and AI Engineer
responsibilities: Leading AI and data initiatives across the company, from identifying opportunities to delivering production-grade solutions tailored to business needs
Built and deployed an AI chatbot on Microsoft Teams using RAG pipelines (LlamaIndex, FAISS, Cohere Reranker, ColBERT), cutting document lookup time by 60% across teams
Created large-scale document parsing and embedding workflows using Python and OpenAI embeddings, improving search accuracy by combining BM25, hybrid search, and RRF
Developed a real-time computer vision system using YOLOv8 and CLIP for part identification on mobile devices, reaching ~92% accuracy in live classification tasks
Integrated the vision system with ERP workflows through FastAPI and REST APIs, automating part tracking and reducing manual logging errors by 40%
Managed full ML lifecycle—from data collection and model training to deployment—using PyTorch, OpenCV, and Docker for scalable, production-ready solutions

title: Data Science Engineer
responsibilities: Led the development of a vision system using YOLOv8 and UNet to identify and segment garments for automated dismantling and laser cutting
Built scalable image classification pipelines on AWS SageMaker using TensorFlow, improving inference speed and model deployment
Expanded datasets by 30% through custom ETL and augmentation pipelines, boosting model accuracy by 12%
Fine-tuned Inception v3 and developed Siamese Networks to improve part classification and similarity detection, achieving up to 98% accuracy on real-world data
Designed GPU-accelerated training workflows with custom CUDA kernels, reducing training time and improving throughput
Deployed multi-stage object detection systems that cut manual inspection time by 30% in automotive remanufacturing workflows

title: Software Developer and Tester
responsibilities: Deployed 100+ email campaigns for brands like Estée Lauder and MAC Cosmetics using Salesforce Marketing Cloud
Developed personalized email campaigns with a reach of more than 400,000 customers in 100+ countries
Developed automated test suites (Python, Selenium) for web applications, reducing manual testing effort by 24%
Built API test automation scripts to validate functionality and data integrity
Reduced overall test cycle time by 40% using Python scripting in automation testing
Identified & reported 500+ unique bugs across web & mobile applications for a leading Indian cement manufacturer
Performed manual testing of mobile applications, including smoke, functional, integration, regression, and UI testing
